title: Governance of superintelligence
summary: The blog discusses the potential risks and benefits of artificial intelligence (AI) and superintelligence. It suggests that coordination among development efforts is necessary to ensure safety and integration with society. It also proposes the need for an international authority to regulate superintelligence efforts and reduce existential risks. Additionally, the blog emphasizes the importance of developing technical capabilities to make superintelligence safe. Public oversight and democratic decision-making are highlighted as crucial in governing powerful AI systems. The blog concludes by stating that despite the risks, building AI technology is necessary for a better world and stopping its creation would be challenging.
